title: Remax fonts
content:
Hi friends

Pleas ehelp me id these fonts used for the remax logo

Thanks in advance

Hernando

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150320091030im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Grafico1_4341.jpg)
author: hernandomiguel

comments.content: REMAX ANCHOR looks like it was mixed from ITC Avant Garde alternate and Helvetica Condensed. Marine Park looks like Zapfino with a stroke added.
Oh yuk. "ANCHO" appears to be Helvetica Neue Condensed Bold – and then they repeated the "R" from the RE/MAX logo. They could at least have equalized the stem weights. :-\
Yer, it's a pretty weird and eye-poking mix.
